Text:
Team YIFY: Unfortunately, something must have happened during Bokutox:s encoding of this movie, because every now and then the movie "twitches" ending up on the wrong frame compared to when the "twitching" started. Maybe his computer experienced heavy loads?

I've tried to play it in three different players: Vlc, ZoomPlayer and Media player classic, all with the same result.

I'm not complaining, cause I LOVE Team YIFYs uploads, and this is accually the very FIRST time I felt compelled to issue an "negative" comment about their uploads. Just making you aware if you still choose to download it.
By the way: There is nothing the wrong with my computer: It's duly updated, defragmented and maintained, has enough speed and quite enough memory capacity as well.
Though: I could have ended the download prematurely, which has happened once or twice. But my comment is for safety; as if I did not. Sorry 'bout the fuzz...
Hmm. I have not had Any other complaints about this on here or Yify-Torrents. It looks amazing on my screen. No negative aspects.
